1.name: Warborne
1.details: Each time Arus basic attacks an enemy Hero, he gains 2 / 3 / 4% (at level 1, 7, 13) life steal for a 3 seconds (maximum 5 stacks).

2.name: Decimating Strike
2.details:
Arus gains 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% movement speed for 2 seconds and his next basic attack within 4 seconds deals 30 / 60 / 90 / 120 / 150 (+50% physical power) physical damage to the target.

At maximum stack of Warborne, Decimate deals an additional 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8% of the target’s maximum health as physical damage.

3.name: Glaive Whirl
3.details:
After a short delay, Arus swings his glaive around, dealing 50 / 80 / 110 / 140 / 170 (+80% physical power) physical damage to nearby enemies.

Those hit on the inner part of the glaive only take 10% of the damage.

At maximum stack of Warborne, Glaive Whirl’s outer edge will shred the enemies’ armour by 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30%.

4.name: Scorching Edge
4.details:
Arus swings up his glaive to send out a flaming wave in a target direction, dealing 8 / 10 / 12 / 14 / 16% of the target’s maximum health as magical damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by 60%, decaying over the next 2 seconds.

At maximum stacks of Warborne, Scorching Edge sends out 2 waves but the slow effect can only be reset instead of stacking up.

5.name: War Cry
5.details:
Arus lets out a powerful war cry, granting himself maximum stacks of Warborne and extra 15 / 25 / 35% physical power for 10 seconds.

During War Cry, Warborne stacks cannot be lost and killing an enemy Hero extends the duration by 7 seconds.
